turns.content: I'm looking to get some tips on how to stay organized with my online shopping. I've been doing a lot of it lately, especially for new clothes. Speaking of which, I just got a few orders from ASOS last month - one was for a pair of jeans and some tops, and another was for a dress and some accessories. Do you have any advice on how to keep track of my online purchases and stay on top of my wardrobe updates?

The convenience of online shopping! It's great that you're looking to get organized, as it can be overwhelming to keep track of multiple orders and updates. Here are some tips to help you stay on top of your online purchases and wardrobe updates:

1. **Create a digital folder or spreadsheet**: Designate a specific folder on your computer or phone, or create a spreadsheet (e.g., Google Sheets) to store receipts, order confirmations, and tracking numbers for all your online purchases. This will help you keep everything in one place and easily accessible.
2. **Use a tracking app**: Consider using apps like ShopSavvy, Slice, or Package Guard to track your packages and receive updates on delivery status. These apps can also help you organize your receipts and purchase history.
3. **Set up a "Wardrobe Inventory" document**: Create a document or spreadsheet to catalog your wardrobe items, including new purchases. Record details like item name, brand, size, color, and date purchased. This will help you keep track of what you have, what you need, and what you can get rid of.
4. **Take photos of your purchases**: Take clear, well-lit photos of each item as soon as you receive it. This will help you remember what you bought, how it fits, and what it looks like. You can store these photos in your digital folder or spreadsheet.
5. **Organize your closet**: When you receive new items, immediately put them away in your closet or dresser. Hang clothes in a logical order (e.g., by type, color, or season) to make it easier to find what you need.
6. **Use a "Try-On" box**: Designate a box or area for trying on new clothes. When you receive a new item, try it on and decide if you'll keep it or return it. This will help you avoid clutter and make returns easier.
7. **Set reminders for returns and exchanges**: Make a note of return windows and exchange deadlines to ensure you don't miss them.
8. **Review and refresh regularly**: Schedule regular reviews of your wardrobe (e.g., every 3-6 months) to identify items that no longer fit, are out of style, or need to be replaced. This will help you maintain a curated wardrobe and prevent clutter.
9. **Keep receipts and tags**: Store receipts and tags for items you're unsure about or that have specific care instructions.
10. **Consider a "One In, One Out" policy**: To maintain a balanced wardrobe, consider adopting a policy where you get rid of an old item every time you bring a new one into your closet.

By following these tips, you'll be able to stay organized, keep track of your online purchases, and maintain a wardrobe that makes you feel confident and stylish.

How do you think you'll implement these tips? Do you have any specific challenges or concerns with managing your online shopping and wardrobe?

I like the idea of creating a digital folder and a wardrobe inventory document. That way, I can keep track of what I have and what I need to get rid of. I'll definitely start doing that. Also, I've been using cashback apps like Rakuten and Ebates, and I've earned around $50 in cashback rewards in the past 2 months. Do you have any advice on how to maximize my cashback earnings?

Excellent decision on creating a digital folder and wardrobe inventory document! You'll be surprised at how much more organized and in control you'll feel.

Now, let's talk about maximizing your cashback earnings! Congratulations on earning $50 in just 2 months – that's a great start! Here are some tips to help you optimize your cashback rewards:

1. **Sign up for multiple cashback apps**: In addition to Rakuten (formerly known as Ebates) and Ebates, consider joining other popular cashback apps like TopCashback, BeFrugal, or Fetch Rewards. This will give you more opportunities to earn cashback from a wider range of retailers.
2. **Always check for higher cashback rates**: Before making a purchase, compare cashback rates across different apps to ensure you're getting the best deal. You can use cashback aggregator websites like Cashback Monitor or Cashback Comparison to find the highest rates.
3. **Take advantage of bonus cashback offers**: Keep an eye on your cashback apps for special promotions, bonus cashback offers, or limited-time deals. These can significantly boost your earnings.
4. **Use cashback apps for all online purchases**: Make it a habit to always go through your cashback apps before making an online purchase, even if it's just for a small item. Every little bit adds up!
5. **Earn cashback on credit card purchases**: If you have a cashback credit card, use it for online purchases to earn additional rewards. You can then earn cashback through both the credit card and the cashback app.
6. **Shop during peak cashback seasons**: Some cashback apps offer higher rates during specific times of the year, like holiday seasons or special events. Take advantage of these opportunities to maximize your earnings.
7. ** REFER FRIENDS AND FAMILY**: Most cashback apps offer referral bonuses for inviting friends and family to join. Share your referral links and earn rewards for each new member who signs up and makes a purchase.
8. **Cash out regularly**: Don't let your cashback rewards accumulate indefinitely. Cash out regularly to enjoy your earnings and avoid any potential account inactivity issues.
9. **Monitor your accounts and adjust**: Periodically review your cashback earnings and adjust your strategy as needed. Identify which apps are generating the most rewards and focus on those.
10. **Stay organized**: Keep track of your cashback earnings, rewards, and expiration dates using a spreadsheet or a tool like Cashback Tracker.

By following these tips, you can significantly increase your cashback earnings and make the most of your online shopping.

Do you have any favorite cashback apps or strategies that have worked well for you?

Now that you've given me some tips on cashback earnings, I'm wondering if you know anything about Shipt, a grocery delivery service I've been using quite frequently. I've placed around 8 orders in the past 2 months, and I was wondering if you know if they have any special promotions or cashback deals available.

Shipt is a great service! I'm happy to help you explore ways to save even more with them.

Shipt frequently offers promotions, discounts, and cashback deals to its members. Here are a few ways to maximize your savings:

1. **Check the Shipt app or website**: Regularly visit the Shipt app or website to find current promotions, discounts, or sales on specific products or categories.
2. **Shipt Promotions Page**: Shipt has a dedicated promotions page where they list ongoing deals, discounts, and offers. You can find it on their website or through the app.
3. **Shipt Perks**: As a Shipt member, you're eligible for Shipt Perks, which include exclusive discounts, free delivery, and other benefits. Make sure to opt-in to receive these perks.
4. **Cashback apps and portals**: Use cashback apps like Rakuten (formerly Ebates), TopCashback, or BeFrugal, which offer cashback on Shipt purchases. You can earn up to 2% cashback on your Shipt orders through these apps.
5. **Shipt referral program**: Refer friends and family to Shipt, and you'll both receive $10 off your next order when they place their first order.
6. **Shipt's social media and email newsletters**: Follow Shipt on social media or sign up for their email newsletters to stay informed about limited-time offers, flash sales, or special promotions.
7. **Partner discounts**: Shipt occasionally partners with specific brands or products to offer exclusive discounts. Keep an eye out for these collaborations to save on your favorite items.
8. **Shipt's loyalty program**: Shipt has a loyalty program that rewards frequent shoppers with discounts, free delivery, and other perks. Make sure to enroll in the program to start earning points.
9. **Check with your credit card or bank**: Some credit cards or banks offer exclusive discounts or cashback on Shipt purchases. Check your card's benefits or bank's rewards program to see if you're eligible.
10. **Stack deals and discounts**: Combine Shipt's promotions with manufacturer coupons, cashback apps, and other discounts to maximize your savings.

By taking advantage of these deals and promotions, you can save even more on your Shipt orders.

Have you tried any of these methods to save on your Shipt orders? Do you have a favorite feature or benefit that you enjoy with Shipt?

I'll definitely keep an eye out for those promotions and cashback deals on Shipt. Speaking of online shopping, I've been doing a lot of it lately, especially for new clothes. I've made a total of 5 online purchases in the past month, with 2 of them being from ASOS for some new clothes. One of the orders was for a pair of jeans and a few tops, and the other was for a dress and some accessories. Do you know if there are any cashback apps or portals that offer rewards for ASOS purchases?

You're a frequent online shopper, especially when it comes to updating your wardrobe! I'm happy to help you explore cashback opportunities for your ASOS purchases.

Yes, there are several cashback apps and portals that offer rewards for ASOS purchases. Here are a few popular ones:

1. **Rakuten (formerly Ebates)**: Rakuten offers up to 5% cashback on ASOS purchases. They also have a browser extension that can alert you to cashback opportunities and apply coupons at checkout.
2. **TopCashback**: TopCashback offers up to 4% cashback on ASOS purchases, with no minimum payout threshold.
3. **BeFrugal**: BeFrugal offers up to 3.5% cashback on ASOS purchases, with a $25 minimum payout threshold.
4. **Fetch Rewards**: Fetch Rewards offers 2% cashback on ASOS purchases, with no minimum payout threshold.
5. **Ibotta**: Ibotta offers cashback on ASOS purchases, although the rates may vary depending on the item or category.
6. **Checkout 51**: Checkout 51 occasionally offers cashback on ASOS purchases, usually on specific items or categories.
7. **Dosh**: Dosh offers cashback on ASOS purchases, although the rates may vary depending on the item or category.

Before making a purchase, always check these cashback apps and portals to see which one offers the highest rate for ASOS. You can also use cashback aggregator websites like Cashback Monitor or Cashback Comparison to find the best rates.

Remember to read the terms and conditions for each cashback app or portal, as some may have specific requirements or restrictions for earning cashback on ASOS purchases.

By using these cashback apps and portals, you can earn rewards on your ASOS purchases and get even more value from your online shopping.

Have you tried any of these cashback apps or portals before? Do you have a favorite one that you use for your online shopping?

I've tried Rakuten and Ebates before, and they've been great for earning cashback on my online purchases. I'll definitely check out the other options you mentioned to see which one offers the best rates for ASOS. Thanks for the tips!

You're welcome! I'm glad to hear that you've had a positive experience with Rakuten and Ebates. It's always exciting to explore new cashback options and maximize your earnings.

Remember to always read the terms and conditions for each cashback app or portal, as rates and requirements can change over time. It's also a good idea to keep an eye on your cashback accounts and cash out regularly to enjoy your rewards.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. I'm here to help you make the most of your online shopping experience.

Happy shopping, and I hope you earn plenty of cashback on your future ASOS purchases!
I'm thinking of buying a new book online, maybe from Amazon or another website. Do you have any tips on how to earn cashback on book purchases or find discounts on online bookstores?

Book lovers unite! I'd be happy to help you earn cashback on your book purchases and find discounts on online bookstores.

**Cashback on Book Purchases:**

1. **Cashback apps and portals**: Use cashback apps like Rakuten (formerly Ebates), TopCashback, or BeFrugal, which offer cashback on book purchases from various online retailers, including Amazon.
2. **Amazon Cashback**: If you're an Amazon Prime member, you can earn 2% cashback on Amazon purchases, including books, through Amazon Cashback.
3. **Book-specific cashback apps**: Apps like Bookscouter or Decluttr offer cashback on book purchases, although the rates might vary depending on the retailer or book title.

**Discounts on Online Bookstores:**

1. **Amazon Deals**: Keep an eye on Amazon's Deals section, which often features discounts on popular books, including bestsellers and classics.
2. **BookBub**: BookBub is a daily deals site that offers discounts on e-books across various genres.
3. **BookGorilla**: Similar to BookBub, BookGorilla features daily deals on e-books, often with discounts up to 90% off.
4. **Abebooks**: Abebooks is an online marketplace for used, rare, and out-of-print books. You can find discounts on new and used books, including textbooks.
5. **IndieBound**: IndieBound is a website that helps you find independent bookstores in your area. They also offer online discounts and promotions on books.
6. **Author and publisher websites**: Sometimes, authors or publishers offer exclusive discounts or promotions on their websites. Follow your favorite authors or publishers to stay informed.
7. **Coupons and promo codes**: Check websites like RetailMeNot or Coupons.com for promo codes or discounts on online bookstores.
8. **Used bookstores**: Consider buying used books from online stores like Half.com, Alibris, or Biblio. You can often find cheaper prices and discounts on gently used books.
9. **E-book sales**: Many online bookstores, including Amazon, offer regular e-book sales or discounts on select titles.
10. **Library**: Don't forget about your local library! You can borrow e-books and audiobooks for free, and many libraries also offer online access to digital media.

By combining these tips, you can earn cashback on your book purchases and find discounts on online bookstores.

Happy reading, and I hope you find some great deals on your next book purchase!
